31  template < typename className >
32  void CallSafeFunctionReturningVoid( className * ptr,
33  void ( APICALL className::*Func )( pcIError_base & ) )
34  {
35  pcIError_base error( NULL );
36  ( ptr->*Func )( error );
37  if ( error ) throw IError::MakeShared( error );
38  }

95  template < typename className, typename returnType, typename internalReturnType >
96  returnType CallSafeFunction( className * ptr,
97  internalReturnType ( APICALL className::*Func )( pcIError_base & ) )
98  {
99  pcIError_base error( NULL );
100  internalReturnType returnValue = (ptr->*Func)( error );
101  if ( error ) throw IError::MakeShared( error );
102  #if XMP_WinBuild
103  #pragma warning( push )
104  #pragma warning( disable : 4800 )
105  #endif
106  return static_cast< returnType >( returnValue );
107  #if XMP_WinBuild
108  #pragma warning( pop )
109  #endif
110  }
111

191  template < typename className, typename internalReturnType, typename sharedPointerType >
192  shared_ptr< sharedPointerType > CallSafeFunctionReturningPointer( className * ptr,
193  internalReturnType ( APICALL className::*Func )( pcIError_base & ) )
